title: Involving Your Kids in Church and Ministry
itunes:author: Featured Guest: Shauna Pilgreen
itunes:summary:
It can be discouraging when your child acts uninterested in Sunday worship or church activities. John and Danny offer practical advice for involving kids of all ages in church and ministry.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get the book "Love Where You Live" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2021-03-16?refcd=1080512

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/involving-your-kids-in-church-and-ministry/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey
